languages.text: "Видит Император, красноречием я обделен, поэтому прошу вас снова — как могу. Мне нужна ваша помощь не чтобы спастись, но чтобы продолжить служение Лекс Империалис. Маршал должен получить сведения, что я добыл. Если вы желаете, чтобы я умолял, то я готов — моя гордость ничто в сравнении с долгом".

"Emperor knows I am no orator, so I will ask you again, as well as I can. I need your help, not to save myself, but so that I may continue serving the Lex Imperialis. The Marshal must receive the information I have obtained here. If you want me to beg, I will — my pride means nothing compared to my duty."
languages.original_text: "Видит Император, красноречием я обделен, поэтому прошу вас снова — как могу. Мне нужна ваша помощь не чтобы спастись, но чтобы продолжить служение Лекс Империалис. Маршал должен получить сведения, что я добыл. Если вы желаете, чтобы я умолял, то я готов — моя гордость ничто в сравнении с долгом".

The Marshal must receive the information I have obtained here. If you want me to beg, I will — my pride means nothing compared to duty."

The Marshal must receive the information I have obtained here. If you want me to beg, I will — my pride means nothing compared to my duty."

"Emperor knows I am no orator, so I will ask you again, as well as I can. I need your help, not to save myself, but so that I may continue serving the Lex Imperialis. The Marshal must receive the information I have obtained here. If you want me to beg, I will — my pride means nothing compared to my duty."

languages.text: "Ich bin wahrlich kein großer Redner, also frage ich Euch erneut, so gut ich es vermag. Ich brauche Eure Hilfe. Nicht, um mich selbst zu retten, sondern um dem Lex Imperia weiter dienen zu können. Der Marschall muss die Informationen erhalten, die ich hier erlangt habe. Wenn Ihr wollt, dass ich Euch anflehe, werde ich es tun ... mein Stolz ist gemessen an meiner Pflicht bedeutungslos."
languages.original_text: "Emperor knows I am no orator, so I will ask you again, as well as I can. I need your help, not to save myself, but so that I may continue serving the Lex Imperialis. The Marshal must receive the information I have obtained here. If you want me to beg, I will — my pride means nothing compared to my duty."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin wahrlich kein großer Redner, also frage ich Euch erneut, so gut ich es vermag. Ich brauche Eure Hilfe. Nicht, um mich selbst zu retten, sondern um dem Lex Imperia weiter dienen zu können. Der Marschall muss die Informationen erhalten, die ich hier erlangt habe. Wenn Ihr wollt, dass ich Euch anflehe, werde ich es tun ... mein Stolz ist gemessen an meiner Pflicht bedeutungslos."

languages.text: « L'Empereur sait que je ne suis pas un orateur, alors je vais vous le redemander de mon mieux. J'ai besoin de votre aide. Non pour me sauver moi-même, mais pour me permettre de continuer à servir la Lex Imperialis. Les informations que j'ai obtenues ici doivent impérativement parvenir au maréchal. Si vous voulez que je vous implore, je le ferai. Ma fierté ne signifie rien. Seul compte mon devoir. »
languages.original_text: "Emperor knows I am no orator, so I will ask you again, as well as I can. I need your help, not to save myself, but so that I may continue serving the Lex Imperialis. The Marshal must receive the information I have obtained here. If you want me to beg, I will — my pride means nothing compared to my duty."

traits.locale_text: « L'Empereur sait que je ne suis pas un orateur, alors je vais vous le redemander de mon mieux. J'ai besoin de votre aide. Non pour me sauver moi-même, mais pour me permettre de continuer à servir la Lex Imperialis. Les informations que j'ai obtenues ici doivent impérativement parvenir au maréchal. Si vous voulez que je vous implore, je le ferai. Ma fierté ne signifie rien. Seul compte mon devoir. »

languages.text: «El Emperador sabe que no tengo dotes para la oratoria, así que se lo volveré a pedir, con tan buenas palabras como pueda. Necesito su ayuda no para salvarme, sino para continuar sirviendo a la Lex Imperialis. El mariscal debe recibir la información que he obtenido aquí. Si quiere que le suplique, lo haré: mi orgullo no significa nada comparado con mi deber».
languages.original_text: "Emperor knows I am no orator, so I will ask you again, as well as I can. I need your help, not to save myself, but so that I may continue serving the Lex Imperialis. The Marshal must receive the information I have obtained here. If you want me to beg, I will — my pride means nothing compared to my duty."

traits.locale_text: «El Emperador sabe que no tengo dotes para la oratoria, así que se lo volveré a pedir, con tan buenas palabras como pueda. Necesito su ayuda no para salvarme, sino para continuar sirviendo a la Lex Imperialis. El mariscal debe recibir la información que he obtenido aquí. Si quiere que le suplique, lo haré: mi orgullo no significa nada comparado con mi deber».

languages.text: “帝皇知道我不善言辞，所以我再请求一次，尽我所能地恳求你。我需要你的帮助，我并不是贪生怕死，而是为了能继续为帝国法典效力。我在这里得到的情报，必须传达到元帅耳中。如果你想让我乞求你的怜悯，那我愿意这么做。与职责相比，我的脸面算不了什么。”
languages.original_text: "Emperor knows I am no orator, so I will ask you again, as well as I can. I need your help, not to save myself, but so that I may continue serving the Lex Imperialis. The Marshal must receive the information I have obtained here. If you want me to beg, I will — my pride means nothing compared to my duty."

traits.locale_text: “帝皇知道我不善言辞，所以我再请求一次，尽我所能地恳求你。我需要你的帮助，我并不是贪生怕死，而是为了能继续为帝国法典效力。我在这里得到的情报，必须传达到元帅耳中。如果你想让我乞求你的怜悯，那我愿意这么做。与职责相比，我的脸面算不了什么。”

languages.text: 「私が雄弁とは程遠い者であることは、皇帝陛下も重々ご承知のはずです。ですから、拙いながらも、もう一度、お願いさせていただきます。私が助けを求めているのは、自分を救うためではありません。レックス・インペリアに仕え続けるためです。私がこの地で手に入れた情報は、必ず将帥に届けなければなりません。懇願せよとおっしゃるなら、そうしましょう―私の誇りなど、使命に比べれば取るに足らないものです」
languages.original_text: "Emperor knows I am no orator, so I will ask you again, as well as I can. I need your help, not to save myself, but so that I may continue serving the Lex Imperialis. The Marshal must receive the information I have obtained here. If you want me to beg, I will — my pride means nothing compared to my duty."

traits.locale_text: 「私が雄弁とは程遠い者であることは、皇帝陛下も重々ご承知のはずです。ですから、拙いながらも、もう一度、お願いさせていただきます。私が助けを求めているのは、自分を救うためではありません。レックス・インペリアに仕え続けるためです。私がこの地で手に入れた情報は、必ず将帥に届けなければなりません。懇願せよとおっしゃるなら、そうしましょう―私の誇りなど、使命に比べれば取るに足らないものです」

languages.text: "İmparator bilir ki ben laf cambazlığından pek anlamam ama size elimden geldiğince bir kez daha ifade etmek istiyorum. Yardımınıza ihtiyacım var. Amacım kendi canımı kurtarıp rahata ermek değil, hayatta kalmayı becererek Lex İmperialis'e olan hizmetimi sürdürmektir. Burada edindiğim istihbaratın Miralay'a ulaşması gerekiyor. Yalvarmamı istiyorsanız ayaklarınıza bile kapanırım. Vazifem uğrunda gururumu ayaklar altına almaya razıyım."
languages.original_text: "Emperor knows I am no orator, so I will ask you again, as well as I can. I need your help, not to save myself, but so that I may continue serving the Lex Imperialis. The Marshal must receive the information I have obtained here. If you want me to beg, I will — my pride means nothing compared to my duty."

traits.locale_text: "İmparator bilir ki ben laf cambazlığından pek anlamam ama size elimden geldiğince bir kez daha ifade etmek istiyorum. Yardımınıza ihtiyacım var. Amacım kendi canımı kurtarıp rahata ermek değil, hayatta kalmayı becererek Lex Imperialis'e olan hizmetimi sürdürmektir. Burada edindiğim istihbaratın Miralay'a ulaşması gerekiyor. Yalvarmamı istiyorsanız ayaklarınıza bile kapanırım. Vazifem uğrunda gururumu ayaklar altına almaya razıyım."
